Posts.Content: HI IM 44 ND I WANTED TO KNW IF ANYONE HAS OR WENT THROUGH WAT IM GOING THROUGH I HAVE SENSITIVE BREAST BUT ON MY LEFT ARMPIT I NOTICE IT STARTED AS 1 LUMP BUT THE SHAPING OF IT IS LIKE A STRING BEAN I WENT TO THE DR SHE ORDER A MAMO WHICH TAKE PLACE ON THE 29TH SHE TRY TO TELL ME IS FROM SHAVING IS RARE I SHAVE CUZ MY UNDERARM HAIR DOESNT GROW THAT FAST NW IS OVER A MONTH ND I NOW GOT A TOTAL OF 3 GROWING INWARD TOWARD MY BREAST ND WHEN I GAVE MYSELF AN EXAMINE I NOTICE ALSO ON MY LEFT BREAST I HAVE A SIZE OF A PEA GROWING I KEEP TELLING MYSELF IS NOTHING BUT IM STRESSING MYSELF TRYING TO WONDER WHAT CAN IT B ANY ANSWER PLZ GOD BLESS
Posts.Title: possible fibroadenoma
